remarks: A continuous function ` F ` on an open interval ` ( A (,) B ) ` with a finite right limit ` R ` in ` A ` and a finite left limit ` L ` in ` B ` is bounded.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cncfioobd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cncfioobd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cncfioobd.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A (,) B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
cncfioobd.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( F limCC B ) ) $.
cncfioobd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( F limCC A ) ) $.
cncfioobd $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. y e. ( A (,) B ) ( abs ` ( F ` y ) ) <_ x ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph x y $.
